CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, zitadel_user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, lang VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, resource_owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE tenancy ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, account_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
